title: Chinese Medicine Programs
description: The University of Bridgeport Acupuncture Institute is an integrated unit of University of Bridgeport. The program seeks to advance the discipline of Traditional Chinese Medicine through educational, clinical and scholarly activities.
cleaned_text: Chinese Medicine Programs Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine MS The Master's in Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine offers comprehensive training in Chinese herbal medicine and acupuncture to prepare graduates to provide their patients the full range of the benefits of Chinese medicine. The program expands upon the curriculum offered in the Master's in Acupuncture by adding training in herb theory, dispensary practice and clinical herbal training. [Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine MS](/academics/programs/chinese-medicine-ms/) Chinese Herbology MS The Master of Science in Chinese Herbology degree program joins the Acupuncture MS degree program and the Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine MS degree program within the Acupuncture Institute. It is a part of the Health Sciences Division which also includes physician assistant, nutrition, chiropractic, and dental hygiene. Traditional Chinese Medicine DAc.TCM University of Bridgeport's Acupuncture Institute (UBAI) is proud to offer the Doctor of Acupuncture with Traditional Chinese Medicine (DAcTCM) degree program, a comprehensive training in Chinese herbal medicine, acupuncture, adjunctive therapies, and biomedicine at the graduate level. Your Future Starts Today! [Apply online](/apply/)! - We have [comprehensive support services](/student-experience/)that will get you through college and into a great career. Contact us today!
